sign up for my [**mailing list**][1] to receive news and exclusive offers!

-join us for our **mini-makes crochet along**, hosted by **clover usa** and **curiouspapaya**. find all of the free cal details **[here][2]**.

-this cal features 5 miniature crochet designs - each will be kept a secret until its release date (however, those who get the [pdf bundle][3] will receive immediate access to all 5 patterns).

-each pattern will take ~30-60 min. to complete and will be less than 2 in. x 2 in. in size if using the prescribed materials.

-the patterns in this bundle range from beginner-intermediate level due to being worked in a spiral, rows, and in joined rnds.

-a full list of materials for each of the 5 designs will need is included in the pdf.

-follow me on instagram @curiouspapaya for the latest updates!
